message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $925000. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $910000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to ensure I'm fairly compensated for the product. I'm now willing to sell it to you for $920000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can agree on this price.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $915000. I hope this aligns better with our respective positions.
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $918000, but I'm not going to go any lower. This is my last concession, so I hope we can finally agree on a price.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $916000. I hope this brings us closer to closing the deal.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm going to meet you at $917000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. This is my final offer, so I hope we can agree on this price.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I've done my best to negotiate within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $916500. I hope this is acceptable, and we can finalize the deal.
